changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Create constraints and indexes for GO nodes, created on 04/05/2022
changeSet.sql: CREATE CONSTRAINT constraint_db_GO_eid IF NOT EXISTS ON (n:db_GO) ASSERT n.eid IS UNIQUE; CREATE CONSTRAINT constraint_Synonym_name IF NOT EXISTS ON (n:Synonym) ASSERT n.name IS UNIQUE; CREATE INDEX index_Synonym_lowercase_name IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:Synonym) ON (n.lowercase_name); CREATE INDEX index_db_GO_name IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:db_GO) ON (n.name);

changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load GO go.tsv from go-data-04052022.zip, 47273 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row with row where row.namespace='biological_process' MERGE (n:db_GO {eid: row.eid}) SET n:BiologicalProcess,n.name=row.name,n.description=row.description,n.obsolete=row.obsolete,n.alt_id=row.alt_id,n.namespace=row.namespace,n.data_source='GO'

changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load GO go.tsv from go-data-04052022.zip, 47273 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row with row where row.namespace='molecular_function' MERGE (n:db_GO {eid: row.eid}) SET n:MolecularFunction,n.name=row.name,n.description=row.description,n.obsolete=row.obsolete,n.alt_id=row.alt_id,n.namespace=row.namespace,n.data_source='GO'

changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load GO go.tsv from go-data-04052022.zip, 47273 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row with row where row.namespace='cellular_component' MERGE (n:db_GO {eid: row.eid}) SET n:CellularComponent,n.name=row.name,n.description=row.description,n.obsolete=row.obsolete,n.alt_id=row.alt_id,n.namespace=row.namespace,n.data_source='GO'

changeSet.id: load db_GO synonyms from go-data-04052022.zip, date 04/05/2022
changeSet.author: rcai

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MERGE (a:Synonym {name: row.name}) SET a.lowercase_name=toLower(row.name) WITH row, a MATCH (b:db_GO {eid: row.eid}) MERGE (b)-[r:HAS_SYNONYM]->(a)

changeSet.id: load IS_A relationship in go-rels.tsv from go-data-04052022.zip, date 04/05/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Load GO IS_A relationships, go-rels.tsv from go-data-04052022.zip

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row with row where row.RELATIONSHIP='IS_A' MATCH (a:db_GO {eid: row.from_id}), (b:db_GO {eid: row.to_id}) MERGE (a)-[r:IS_A]->(b) RETURN COUNT(*)

changeSet.id: load REPLACED_BY relationship in go-rels.tsv from go-data-04052022.zip, date 04/05/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Load GO REPLACED_BY relationships, go-rels.tsv from go-data-04052022.zip

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row with row where row.RELATIONSHIP='REPLACED_BY' MATCH (a:db_GO {eid: row.from_id}), (b:db_GO {eid: row.to_id}) MERGE (a)-[r:REPLACED_BY]->(b) RETURN COUNT(*)
